verbs.description: < p > The White House and senior Chinese officials [V: are] discussing a targeted economic deal that would relax severe penalties on ZTE , a major Chinese telecom company , in exchange for unspecified demands from President Trump , two people briefed on the discussions said Sunday.</p >

< p > [ARG0: The White House and senior Chinese officials] are [V: discussing] [ARG1: a targeted economic deal that would relax severe penalties on ZTE , a major Chinese telecom company , in exchange for unspecified demands from President Trump] , two people briefed on the discussions said Sunday.</p >

< p > The White House and senior Chinese officials are discussing a [V: targeted] [ARG1: economic deal] that would relax severe penalties on ZTE , a major Chinese telecom company , in exchange for unspecified demands from President Trump , two people briefed on the discussions said Sunday.</p >

< p > The White House and senior Chinese officials are discussing a targeted economic deal that [V: would] relax severe penalties on ZTE , a major Chinese telecom company , in exchange for unspecified demands from President Trump , two people briefed on the discussions said Sunday.</p >

< p > The White House and senior Chinese officials are discussing [ARG0: a targeted economic deal] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: relax] [ARG1: severe penalties on ZTE , a major Chinese telecom company ,] [ARGM-PRP: in exchange for unspecified demands from President Trump] , two people briefed on the discussions said Sunday.</p >

< p > The White House and senior Chinese officials are discussing a targeted economic deal that would relax severe penalties on ZTE , a major Chinese telecom company , in exchange for unspecified demands from President Trump , [ARG1: two people] [V: briefed] [ARG2: on the discussions] said Sunday.</p >

[ARG1: < p > The White House and senior Chinese officials are discussing a targeted economic deal that would relax severe penalties on ZTE , a major Chinese telecom company , in exchange for unspecified demands from President Trump] , [ARG0: two people briefed on the discussions] [V: said] [ARGM-PRD: Sunday.</p] >
